00108 static void *lov_key_init(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00109                           struct lu_context_key *key)
00110 {
00111         struct lov_thread_info *info;
00112 
00113         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(info, lov_thread_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00114         if (info == NULL)
00115                 info = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00116         return info;
00117 }
00118 
00119 static void lov_key_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00120                          struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
00121 {
00122         struct lov_thread_info *info = data;
00123         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(info, lov_thread_kmem);
00124 }
00125 
00126 struct lu_context_key lov_key = {
00127         .lct_tags = LCT_CL_THREAD,
00128         .lct_init = lov_key_init,
00129         .lct_fini = lov_key_fini
00130 };
00131 
00132 static void *lov_session_key_init(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00133                                   struct lu_context_key *key)
00134 {
00135         struct lov_session *info;
00136 
00137         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(info, lov_session_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00138         if (info == NULL)
00139                 info = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00140         return info;
00141 }
00142 
00143 static void lov_session_key_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00144                                  struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
00145 {
00146         struct lov_session *info = data;
00147         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(info, lov_session_kmem);
00148 }

00150 struct lu_context_key lov_session_key = {
00151         .lct_tags = LCT_SESSION,
00152         .lct_init = lov_session_key_init,
00153         .lct_fini = lov_session_key_fini
00154 };

00157 LU_TYPE_INIT_FINI(lov, &lov_key, &lov_session_key);
00158 
00159 static struct lu_device *lov_device_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00160                                          struct lu_device *d)
00161 {
00162         int i;
00163         struct lov_device *ld = lu2lov_dev(d);
00164 
00165         LASSERT(ld->ld_lov != NULL);
00166         if (ld->ld_target == NULL)
00167                 RETURN(NULL);
00168 
00169         lov_foreach_target(ld, i) {
00170                 struct lovsub_device *lsd;
00171 
00172                 lsd = ld->ld_target[i];
00173                 if (lsd != NULL) {
00174                         cl_stack_fini(env, lovsub2cl_dev(lsd));
00175                         ld->ld_target[i] = NULL;
00176                 }
00177         }
00178         RETURN(NULL);
00179 }
00180 
00181 static int lov_device_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *d,
00182                            const char *name, struct lu_device *next)
00183 {
00184         struct lov_device *ld = lu2lov_dev(d);
00185         int i;
00186         int rc = 0;
00187 
00188         LASSERT(d->ld_site != NULL);
00189         if (ld->ld_target == NULL)
00190                 RETURN(rc);
00191 
00192         lov_foreach_target(ld, i) {
00193                 struct lovsub_device *lsd;
00194                 struct cl_device     *cl;
00195                 struct lov_tgt_desc  *desc;
00196 
00197                 desc = ld->ld_lov->lov_tgts[i];
00198                 if (desc == NULL)
00199                         continue;
00200 
00201                 cl = cl_type_setup(env, d->ld_site, &lovsub_device_type,
00202                                    desc->ltd_obd->obd_lu_dev);
00203                 if (IS_ERR(cl)) {
00204                         rc = PTR_ERR(cl);
00205                         break;
00206                 }
00207                 lsd = cl2lovsub_dev(cl);
00208                 lsd->acid_idx = i;
00209                 lsd->acid_super = ld;
00210                 ld->ld_target[i] = lsd;
00211         }
00212 
00213         if (rc)
00214                 lov_device_fini(env, d);
00215         else
00216                 ld->ld_flags |= LOV_DEV_INITIALIZED;
00217 
00218         RETURN(rc);
00219 }
00220 
00221 static void lov_emerg_free(struct lov_device_emerg **emrg, int nr)
00222 {
00223         int i;
00224 
00225         for (i = 0; i < nr; ++i) {
00226                 struct lov_device_emerg *em;
00227 
00228                 em = emrg[i];
00229                 if (em != NULL) {
00230                         LASSERT(em->emrg_page_list.pl_nr == 0);
00231                         if (em->emrg_env != NULL)
00232                                 cl_env_put(em->emrg_env, &em->emrg_refcheck);
00233                         OBD_FREE_PTR(em);
00234                 }
00235         }
00236         OBD_FREE(emrg, nr * sizeof emrg[0]);
00237 }
00238 
00239 static struct lu_device *lov_device_free(const struct lu_env *env,
00240                                          struct lu_device *d)
00241 {
00242         struct lov_device *ld = lu2lov_dev(d);
00243         const int          nr = ld->ld_target_nr;
00244 
00245         cl_device_fini(lu2cl_dev(d));
00246         if (ld->ld_target != NULL)
00247                 OBD_FREE(ld->ld_target, nr * sizeof ld->ld_target[0]);
00248         if (ld->ld_emrg != NULL)
00249                 lov_emerg_free(ld->ld_emrg, nr);
00250         OBD_FREE_PTR(ld);
00251         return NULL;
00252 }
00253 
00254 static void lov_cl_del_target(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *dev,
00255                               __u32 index)
00256 {
00257         struct lov_device *ld = lu2lov_dev(dev);
00258         ENTRY;
00259 
00260         if (ld->ld_target[index] != NULL) {
00261                 cl_stack_fini(env, lovsub2cl_dev(ld->ld_target[index]));
00262                 ld->ld_target[index] = NULL;
00263         }
00264         EXIT;
00265 }
00266 
00267 static struct lov_device_emerg **lov_emerg_alloc(int nr)
00268 {
00269         struct lov_device_emerg **emerg;
00270         int i;
00271         int result;
00272 
00273         OBD_ALLOC(emerg, nr * sizeof emerg[0]);
00274         if (emerg == NULL)
00275                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00276         for (result = i = 0; i < nr && result == 0; i++) {
00277                 struct lov_device_emerg *em;
00278 
00279                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(em);
00280                 if (em != NULL) {
00281                         emerg[i] = em;
00282                         cl_page_list_init(&em->emrg_page_list);
00283                         em->emrg_env = cl_env_alloc(&em->emrg_refcheck,
00284                                                     LCT_REMEMBER|LCT_NOREF);
00285                         if (!IS_ERR(em->emrg_env))
00286                                 em->emrg_env->le_ctx.lc_cookie = 0x2;
00287                         else {
00288                                 result = PTR_ERR(em->emrg_env);
00289                                 em->emrg_env = NULL;
00290                         }
00291                 } else
00292                         result = -ENOMEM;
00293         }
00294         if (result != 0) {
00295                 lov_emerg_free(emerg, nr);
00296                 emerg = ERR_PTR(result);
00297         }
00298         return emerg;
00299 }
00300 
00301 static int lov_expand_targets(const struct lu_env *env, struct lov_device *dev)
00302 {
00303         int   result;
00304         __u32 tgt_size;
00305         __u32 sub_size;
00306 
00307         ENTRY;
00308         result = 0;
00309         tgt_size = dev->ld_lov->lov_tgt_size;
00310         sub_size = dev->ld_target_nr;
00311         if (sub_size < tgt_size) {
00312                 struct lovsub_device    **newd;
00313                 struct lov_device_emerg **emerg;
00314                 const size_t              sz   = sizeof newd[0];
00315 
00316                 emerg = lov_emerg_alloc(tgt_size);
00317                 if (IS_ERR(emerg))
00318                         RETURN(PTR_ERR(emerg));
00319 
00320                 OBD_ALLOC(newd, tgt_size * sz);
00321                 if (newd != NULL) {
00322                         mutex_lock(&dev->ld_mutex);
00323                         if (sub_size > 0) {
00324                                 memcpy(newd, dev->ld_target, sub_size * sz);
00325                                 OBD_FREE(dev->ld_target, sub_size * sz);
00326                         }
00327                         dev->ld_target    = newd;
00328                         dev->ld_target_nr = tgt_size;
00329 
00330                         if (dev->ld_emrg != NULL)
00331                                 lov_emerg_free(dev->ld_emrg, sub_size);
00332                         dev->ld_emrg = emerg;
00333                         mutex_unlock(&dev->ld_mutex);
00334                 } else {
00335                         lov_emerg_free(emerg, tgt_size);
00336                         result = -ENOMEM;
00337                 }
00338         }
00339         RETURN(result);
00340 }
00341 
00342 static int lov_cl_add_target(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *dev,
00343                              __u32 index)
00344 {
00345         struct obd_device    *obd = dev->ld_obd;
00346         struct lov_device    *ld  = lu2lov_dev(dev);
00347         struct lov_tgt_desc  *tgt;
00348         struct lovsub_device *lsd;
00349         struct cl_device     *cl;
00350         int rc;
00351         ENTRY;
00352 
00353         obd_getref(obd);
00354 
00355         tgt = obd->u.lov.lov_tgts[index];
00356         LASSERT(tgt != NULL);
00357         LASSERT(tgt->ltd_obd != NULL);
00358 
00359         if (!tgt->ltd_obd->obd_set_up) {
00360                 CERROR("Target %s not set up\n", obd_uuid2str(&tgt->ltd_uuid));
00361                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00362         }
00363 
00364         rc = lov_expand_targets(env, ld);
00365         if (rc == 0 && ld->ld_flags & LOV_DEV_INITIALIZED) {
00366                 LASSERT(dev->ld_site != NULL);
00367 
00368                 cl = cl_type_setup(env, dev->ld_site, &lovsub_device_type,
00369                                    tgt->ltd_obd->obd_lu_dev);
00370                 if (!IS_ERR(cl)) {
00371                         lsd = cl2lovsub_dev(cl);
00372                         lsd->acid_idx = index;
00373                         lsd->acid_super = ld;
00374                         ld->ld_target[index] = lsd;
00375                 } else {
00376                         CERROR("add failed (%d), deleting %s\n", rc,
00377                                obd_uuid2str(&tgt->ltd_uuid));
00378                         lov_cl_del_target(env, dev, index);
00379                         rc = PTR_ERR(cl);
00380                 }
00381         }
00382         obd_putref(obd);
00383         RETURN(rc);
00384 }
00385 
00386 static int lov_process_config(const struct lu_env *env,
00387                               struct lu_device *d, struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
00388 {
00389         struct obd_device *obd = d->ld_obd;
00390         int cmd;
00391         int rc;
00392         int gen;
00393         __u32 index;
00394 
00395         obd_getref(obd);
00396 
00397         cmd = cfg->lcfg_command;
00398         rc = lov_process_config_base(d->ld_obd, cfg, &index, &gen);
00399         if (rc == 0) {
00400                 switch(cmd) {
00401                 case LCFG_LOV_ADD_OBD:
00402                 case LCFG_LOV_ADD_INA:
00403                         rc = lov_cl_add_target(env, d, index);
00404                         if (rc != 0)
00405                                 lov_del_target(d->ld_obd, index, NULL, 0);
00406                         break;
00407                 case LCFG_LOV_DEL_OBD:
00408                         lov_cl_del_target(env, d, index);
00409                         break;
00410                 }
00411         }
00412         obd_putref(obd);
00413         RETURN(rc);
00414 }
00415 
00416 static const struct lu_device_operations lov_lu_ops = {
00417         .ldo_object_alloc      = lov_object_alloc,
00418         .ldo_process_config    = lov_process_config,
00419 };
00420 
00421 static struct lu_device *lov_device_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
00422                                           struct lu_device_type *t,
00423                                           struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
00424 {
00425         struct lu_device *d;
00426         struct lov_device *ld;
00427         struct obd_device *obd;
00428         int rc;
00429 
00430         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ld);
00431         if (ld == NULL)
00432                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00433 
00434         cl_device_init(&ld->ld_cl, t);
00435         d = lov2lu_dev(ld);
00436         d->ld_ops        = &lov_lu_ops;
00437 
00438         mutex_init(&ld->ld_mutex);
00439         lockdep_set_class(&ld->ld_mutex, &cl_lov_device_mutex_class);
00440 
00441         /* setup the LOV OBD */
00442         obd = class_name2obd(lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 0));
00443         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00444         rc = lov_setup(obd, cfg);
00445         if (rc) {
00446                 lov_device_free(env, d);
00447                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(rc));
00448         }
00449 
00450         ld->ld_lov = &obd->u.lov;
00451         RETURN(d);
00452 }
